attributes.action: Suspended all payments and interest on credit cards, loans and BNPL
attributes.additional_details: To help ease the financial pressure on people during the pandemic
attributes.background: Suspended all payments and interest on credit cards, loans and buy now pay later deals for three months as a result of the coronavirus

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305297

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
